basic.description:
Limits, continuity, C1 and linear approximations of functions of several variables. Multiple integrals and Jacobians. Line and surface integrals. The theorems of Green, Stokes, and Gauss.
LEARNING HOURS    132 (36L;12T;84P)
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Advanced Calculus

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     (MATH110 or MATH111 or MATH112) and (MATH120 or MATH121 or MATH122 or MATH124).
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from MATH221; MATH227; MATH280.
